actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act of 1968 by designating the Illinois River at its tributaries as a potential component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Provides for the designation, under the provisions of the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act of 1968, of the Illinois River and its tributaries as a potential component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act of 1968 by designating the Illinois River at its tributaries as a potential component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
